## TextAreaBuilderOptions.showLineNumbers property

Show line numbers on the left (default: false).

**Signature:**

```typescript
showLineNumbers?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

When enabled, displays line numbers in the left margin using `lineNumberStyle` for styling. Useful for code editing or when line references are important.
